title: 5 Signs You Are Ready to Return to French
content:
Have you been thinking about picking up French again? Here are five clear signs that you are ready to embark on your French comeback journey.

1. You find yourself trying to remember French words when you see them in English
2. You feel a pang of regret when you hear someone speaking French fluently
3. You have a trip to France planned (or are dreaming of one)
4. You want to set a positive example for your children or grandchildren
5. You miss the intellectual challenge and cultural enrichment that comes with learning a language

If any of these resonate with you, it is time to take action! French Flow is here to help you rediscover your French skills in a supportive, adult-focused environment.
 
Our 10-week blocks are perfect for French returners. We focus on practical conversation skills and build your confidence through small group sessions. No pressure, no judgment, just friendly, effective French learning.

Ready to start? Book your free 30-minute assessment today!
